name: 許穎超
objective:
本課程主要是介紹括半導體產業概述，半導體元件基礎，半導體元件與後段製造技術與設備，元件電性分析與量測與 半導體封裝。
This course mainly introduce on semiconductor materials and fabrication technology: 
1. Overview of semiconductor industry and circuit componenet introduction
2. Semiconductor fundamental (materials, device physics and application)  
3. Front End of Line (FEOL) Technology
4. Backend of Line (BEOL)  Technology
5. Crystal growth , basic properties of Silicon Wafer
6. Introduce 7 principle fabrication modules: Photo lithography, film deposiotn, etch, clean, CMP,  Diffution and process integration
7. Introduce device electricl test 
8. Semiconductor packaging
schedule:
1. WK1-2: Overview of semiconductor industry and circuit componenet introduction
2. WK3-5: Semiconductor fundamental 
3.WK6-7: Front End of Line (FEOL) Technology
4. WK8: Course review & Midterm examination
5. WK9-10: Backend of Line (BEOL)  Technology
6. WK11-12: Crystal growth , basic properties of Silicon Wafer
7. WK 13-15: Introduce 7 principle fabrication modules
8. WK16: Introduce device electricl test 
9. WK17: Semiconductor packaging
10: WK18:  Course review & Midterm examination
